appledrmod.appledrness.default: %s: Your Appledrness is %s. You should work to become the Appledrmaster!
appledrmod.appledrness.high: %s: My my! Oh la la. You have %s Appledrness! You are truly Appledrtastic!
appledrmod.appledrness.very_high: %s: Wow, you truly exceeded my expectations. %s Appledrness! That is so Appledrcool!
item.appledrmod.apple_greathelm.desc: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!
item.appledrmod.legacy_apple_greathelm.d: I miss the old Apple Doctor!
